sourcesContent:
<ImageBackground source={require('./assets/backgroud.jpg')} style={styles.container}>

<View style={styles.containerLogo}>
  <Image source={img} style={styles.logo}/>
 </View>

  <View style={styles.infor}>
 <View>
 <AntDesign style={styles.icon} name="user" size={20} color="black" />
 
  <TextInput 
  placeholder='UserName'
  style={styles.TextInputs}></TextInput>
  </View>

  <View>
  <AntDesign style={styles.icon} name="lock" size={20} color="black" />
  <TextInput
  placeholder='Password'
  style={styles.TextInputs}></TextInput>
 </View>
 <TouchableOpacity
  style={styles.login}
  onPress = {() => navigation.navigate('Profile', {name: 'Cao'})}>
   <Text style={styles.Texts}>SIGN IN</Text>
 </TouchableOpacity>

 <Text style={{marginTop:40,color:'white'}}
 onPress={() => alert('Forget Passwors')}
 >Forget Password ?</Text>
 <Text style={{marginTop:25,color:'white'}}>___________________________________________</Text>
 <View 
 style={{flex:1, flexDirection:'row',alignContent:'center'}}>
 <Text 
 style={{marginTop:25,
 color:'white',}} 
 
 >Don't have a account ?</Text> 
 <Text 
 style={{marginTop:25,
 color:'#0099ff',
 fontWeight:'bold'
}}
 onPress={() => alert('SIGN UP')}
     > SIGN UP</Text>
 </View>
</View>
</ImageBackground>


const styles = StyleSheet.create({
container: {
flex: 1,
flexDirection:'column',
width: null,
height:null,
alignItems: 'center',
justifyContent: 'center',
},
containerLogo:{
flex:1,
flexDirection:'row',
alignContent:'center',
alignItems:'center',
},
infor:{
flex:1,
flexDirection:'column',
alignItems:'center',
alignContent:'center'
},
logo:{
height:150,
width: 200,
},
TextInputs:{
width: 300,
height: 40,
backgroundColor: 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8)',
color: 'rgba(0,10, 255,1)',
borderRadius:20,
margin:5,
paddingLeft: 35,

},
login:
{
height:40,
borderRadius:10,
margin:5,
marginTop:20,
width:300,
borderRadius:20,
backgroundColor:'#00CCFF',
alignItems:'center'
},
Texts:{
fontWeight:'bold',
color:'white',
marginTop:9
},
icon:{
color:'black',
position:'absolute',
left:15,
top: 12,
}
});
